If you're looking for a more traditional sitcom, "Louie" (N/A) is an interesting documentary-style comedy series about a man named Louie Evans who rides around Boston on his tricycle. While not a movie, it might still tickle your sitcom fancy!

This adventure film stars Dwayne Johnson and Josh Hutcherson, and it follows a young boy searching for his missing grandfather on a mythical island. It's filled with excitement and unexpected discoveries that might just tickle your fancy for the 'weird' genre.

Another movie you might enjoy is "The Lego Movie". This animated film features an ordinary LEGO construction worker who discovers he's special and embarks on a quest to save the LEGO universe from an evil tyrant. With a star-studded cast including Will Ferrell, Morgan Freeman, and Alison Brie, it's a fun and imaginative watch!

Both films feature strong performances and tackle important themes related to war and its consequences.
